TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagesPerSheetDirection extends System.Enum

summary.span: 當列印媒體的單面出現超過一頁的內容時，指定頁面的排列方式。

span.span: Specifies the arrangement of pages when more than one page of content appears on a single side of print media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此類型的值，主要是針對這些用途：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 為成員集合，其屬性的，這些值會指出的印表機支援的頁排列方式。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the page arrangements that the printer supports. - 值為屬性，值會指示排列中指定方向的內容頁面的印表機。As the value of the property of a , the value directs the printer to arrange pages of content in a specified direction. **未知**屬性中不會使用值物件。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定屬性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*的方向每個工作表頁功能將無法辨識的選項 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，則該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有**未知**做為值屬性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the pages-per-sheet-direction feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何測試印表機的功能，以及設定列印工作，以充分利用它們。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection BottomLeft = int32(4)

summary.span: 資料行中的頁面是依從上至下及從右至左的頁面方向排列。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and right to left relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection BottomRight = int32(2)

summary.span: 資料行中的頁面是依頁面方向從上至下及從左至右的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and left to right relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection LeftBottom = int32(3)

summary.span: 資料列中的頁面是依頁面方向從右至左及從上至下的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and top to bottom relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection LeftTop = int32(7)

summary.span: 資料列中的頁面是依頁面方向從右至左及從下至上的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and bottom to top relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection RightBottom = int32(1)

summary.span: 資料列中的頁面是依頁面方向從左至右及從上至下的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and top to bottom relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection RightTop = int32(5)

summary.span: 資料列中的頁面是依頁面方向從左至右及從下至上的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and bottom to top relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection TopLeft = int32(8)

summary.span: 資料行中的頁面是依頁面方向從下至上及從右至左的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and right to left relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection TopRight = int32(6)

summary.span: 資料行中的頁面是依頁面方向從下至上及從左至右的方式排列。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and left to right relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
